content.rendered:
Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up in an abandoned hospital from a coma. He must face a terrifying realization: the world he knows has been destroyed by an apocalyptic zombie epidemic. Not far away, on the border of Atlanta, a handful of people are struggling to survive against the undead lurking in the area. Can Rick and his companions preserve their humanity in this terrifying new world? And in the face of harsh circumstances and personal contradictions, what protects them from each other?”

Number of seasons: 11 (2010- 2022)

Status: Finished

Creator: Frank Darabont

Channel: AMC

Starring: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride
